package main

import (
	"github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
)

const (
	_plaintext  = "/plaintext"
	_json       = "/json"
	_query      = "/query/:queryID"
	_messageStr = "Hello, World!"
)

type _JSONMessage struct {
	Message string `json:"message"`
}

func main() {
	app := fiber.New()
	app.Get(_plaintext, fiberPlaintext)
	app.Get(_json, fiberJSON)
	app.Get(_query, fiberQuery)
	app.Listen(":8080")
}

func fiberPlaintext(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
	return c.SendString(_messageStr)
}

func fiberJSON(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
	return c.JSON(&_JSONMessage{
		Message: _messageStr,
	})
}

func fiberQuery(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
	queryID := c.Query("queryID")
	return c.SendString(queryID)
}
